summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5810 for the improvement of 13th Avenue Southwest, from West Florida Street to West Lander Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermain and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76622 as amended by Ordinance No. 76844, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
